mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_question_bank (user_id, question_type, difficulty, tags, content, options_json, answer, analysis, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{questionType}, #{difficulty}, #{tags}, #{content}, #{optionsJson}, #{answer}, #{analysis}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE edu_question_bank SET question_type = #{questionType}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, tags = #{tags}, content = #{content}, options_json = #{optionsJson}, answer = #{answer}, analysis = #{analysis}, status = #{status} WHERE question_id = #{questionId} AND user_id = #{userId}
